author: .eagleedge
content: Hello everyone, I am trying to set up and run Arbitrum full node by following the instruction but the connection to L1 keeps being denied. I have my own Ethereum full node, so for l1.url I used localhost:8545. Anyone knows what might be the problem or help me with that? Thanks a ton. The instruction I followed was https://developer.offchainlabs.com/node-running/running-a-node
